document.full_text: the death toll from an outbreak of cholera in chad has risen above 100, authorities said, while aid group oxfam warned it could leap further this month with the onset of the rainy season.
document.title: rainy season to aggravate chad cholera outbreak
lines_and_colors: the death toll from an outbreak of cholera in chad has risen above 100, authorities said, while aid group oxfam warned it could leap further this month with the onset of the rainy season.
